Posts.EditableText:
I have made one game in two games in Quest.

The first got 15th place in the 2007 Interactive Fiction Contest (the highest awarded Quest game ever)

and the second can not be discussed until the end of the one room comp.

Why don't you upload your game to the IFDB or the archive?
